TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler(object sender, DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs)
public delegate void DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs ^ e);
type DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 控件添加行时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when rows are added to a control. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用虚拟模式下的 来存储已添加行的情况。The following code example uses a in virtual mode to store the fact that a row has been added. 此示例是 参考主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#30)]
